SELECT T.ORGANKEY, SUM(T.MSG_N) AS MSG_N, SUM(T.MSG_N) AS MSG_N, SUM(T.MSG_R) AS MSG_R, SUM(T.MSG_A) AS MSG_A, SUM(T.MSG_C) AS MSG_C, SUM(T.MSG_D) AS MSG_D, SUM(T.MSG_I) AS MSG_I FROM T07_INREP_BH_MSG T WHERE 1 = 1
T.ORGANKEY IN ($organStr$)
T.ORGANKEY = #organkey#
T.REPORT_DT >= #report_dt_disp#
T.REPORT_DT <= #report_dt_end#
GROUP BY T.ORGANKEY order by T.ORGANKEY

SELECT COUNT(distinct T.ORGANKEY) FROM T07_INREP_BH_MSG T WHERE 1 = 1
T.ORGANKEY in $organkey$
T.ORGANKEY = #organkey#
T.REPORT_DT >= #report_dt_disp#
T.REPORT_DT <= #report_dt_end#

SELECT SUM(T.MSG_N) AS MSG_N, SUM(T.MSG_N) AS MSG_N, SUM(T.MSG_R) AS MSG_R, SUM(T.MSG_A) AS MSG_A, SUM(T.MSG_C) AS MSG_C, SUM(T.MSG_D) AS MSG_D, SUM(T.MSG_I) AS MSG_I FROM T07_INREP_BH_MSG T WHERE 1 = 1
T.ORGANKEY in $organkey$
T.REPORT_DT >= #report_dt_disp#
T.REPORT_DT <= #report_dt_end#
T.ORGANKEY = #organkey#
